title: Empire.io
author: Empire.io
content: Greetings, BTCitcoinTalk gaming community! The weekend is closing in!Enter the divine realm with Gates of Olympus. Wager 100$ on Friday, Saturday, or Sunday and ascend with a heavenly 30 free spins for each day of play. That's up to 90 free spins with only 10x wagering to await you this coming Monday! Dive into a celestial start to your week!How to Get Your Wings:Register/Login at www.Empire.io.Journey to the video slots section.Enjoy Gates of Olympus, ensuring your wagers total at least 100 USDT on any or each of the promo days.Anticipate your free spins – up to 90, based on your participation days, to be credited by Monday 18:00 GMT.T&Cs:Promo Duration: From 06/10 (Friday) 0:00 to 08/10 (Sunday) 23:59 GMT.Eligible Game: Only bets on "Gates of Olympus" qualify for this promotion.Crediting Time: Free spins will grace your account by the upcoming Monday, 18:00 GMT.Wagering Requirement: Proceeds from Free Spins must be wagered 10x within 14 days.Official Guidelines: Empire.io's standard terms and conditions apply.For a deeper dive, check out: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464593.0Don't miss this divine chance – capture the essence of Olympus while it lasts! The Empire awaits your presence on the reels.

comments.author: Empire.io
comments.body: Happy Monday to all!Hope everyone had a great weekend!Those who participated in our 3 day Gates of Olympus promo have had their rewards credited now!Great to see so many people participating  They have been credited as mbtc, so ensure your player currency is adjusted to BTC. Simply navigate to your rewards, activate the free spins, launch the game, and get spinning! See you on the reels!  Cheers!Empire.io - Rule the Reels
